posts.post_content: I have a lot of 10 tobacco cards that are up for trade or sale. I like post ww2 stuff. Nine of the cards are beaters the other one is a hughie jennings portrait with a crease across the middle. Backs are piedmont and caporal, will be adding pics tommorow. PM me with trades or offers. ready to move. i like early aaron mays mantle.

hello, can you send names of t 206 cards. when u say beaters, without photo its tough to know. torn, written on, etc. or light creasing. please let me know. have 57 aaron and a psa 1 1957 mantle berra card. thank you.
